content: Our paper about [Tactile-enabled quadruped transport](https://linchangyi1.github.io/LocoTouch/) got accepted by CORL 2025.
Our paper about [Quadrupedal noise preference alignment](https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.05035) got accepted by IROS 2025.
Our paper about [Multi-agent loco-manipulation](https://collaborative-mapush.github.io/) got accepted by ICRA 2025.
Our paper about [In-Context learning for sim-to-real system identifications](https://sim2real-capture.github.io/) got accepted by RA-L.
One paper about [Offline RL](https://bridge-llm-reasoning.github.io/) was accepted by NeurIPS 2024.
One paper about [Cardiovascular record retrieval](https://arxiv.org/abs/2304.06286) was accepted by PMLR ML4H 2023.
Two papers got accepted to CoRL 2023, and [COVERS](https://sites.google.com/view/rl-covers/) was accepted for an **oral presentation**!
One paper about [Cross-domain robust perception](https://arxiv.org/abs/2011.04408) got accepted to IROS 2023.
